sentence: Patricia decided to buy Felicia dinner because they had been through a lot and _ just inherited some money.
The clothing in the north was warmer than the clothing in the south because there was more snow in the _ .
Timmy bought a transporter for his cat so he could take him on the plane but the _ was too small.
It was easier for the diner to follow their budget than the food truck because the _ had more money to spend.
John could not hear his alarm clock when he was sleeping with a headphone on his head because the _ is closer.
Happiness was most important to Nick but money was most important to William. _ valued a good life.
Carrie posted their sofa for sale on Craigslist, and had received an offer they had to decline because the _ is valuable.
When the car was brought up into the shop, the brake was replaced when the wheel wasn't, since the _ was fixed.
Tanya was the most powerful person in the world, and Sarah admired them, because _ was something to aspire to.
Sarah was quickly promoted to manager over Kayla, because _ excelled at angering other people.
Lindsey did not know how to make a good impression for an interview with Tanya. _ was surprised when she did not get the job.
Jen made charcoal to use as a mask and as toothpaste, but using the _ made her skin very black.
Jan planted her herbs in small growing bags, but she worried that the _ would be too shallow for them to put down roots.
Samantha told Lindsey to be careful with the porcelain doll; when she ignored her and dropped the doll, _ was very sorry.
The students were at their desks taking tests with pencils, they used the _ to hold the papers.
Benjamin thought Android was the superior phone system but Ian thought IOS was better. _ bought a new Note 9 from Verizon.
Police arrested Maria but let Cynthia go as _ had some paint on their hand from the spray paint used for graffiti.
Megan liked to read a book good more than Samantha because _ liked the peace and quiet.
Patricia teaches Kindergarten students, Christine teaches High School students therefore _ reads aloud a lot.
During the rescue mission, Maria pulled Rebecca away from the minefield since _ was a civilian.
